fields.label: Course Title
fields.description: This is the way the course will be listed in the catalog.

fields.label: Sponsor
fields.description: Specify who will be the sponsor of this course.

fields.label: Course Duration
fields.description: Please select the duration for the course you will offer.

fields.label: Scheduling
fields.description: Check the box below if you would be willing to offer this course in the semester following the upcoming semester.

fields.label: Catalog Category
fields.description: Please choose the best category for your course.

fields.label: Course Description (for catalog)
fields.description: Your catalog description must be one paragraph. Please limit it to 150 words. State the content, theme, and goals of the course. Include the amount of preparation required (in pages or hours per week), the class format (lecture, discussion, film, etc.), prerequisites if appropriate, and what is expected of participants. (Please don't include web links, class size, or contact information here.)

fields.label: Past courses led
fields.description: (If more than 3, enter 3.)

fields.label: Co-leader
fields.description: Check the box below if there will be a second Study Group Leader

fields.label: Past courses led
fields.description: (If more than 3, enter 3.)

fields.label: Readings
fields.description: List required books, optional reading, and other readings and preparation materials below. In general, the total cost of books and materials should not exceed $40-$50. Note that we no longer list prices or ISBN numbers. Please do not include them.

fields.label: Books (for catalog)
fields.description: Please list each title separately. To add additional books to the list, click the + in the small circle to the right.

fields.label: Other required materials (for catalog)
fields.description: Other than books, what materials will be used by study group members? For example, list movies, online materials, and handouts. Please limit your description to about 50 words. Now web link here, please.

fields.label: Other readings and preparation (not included in the catalog)
fields.description: Please describe other readings and outside preparation, such as handouts, videos, and online materials you plan to use, to help the Committee understand your course. Include optional reading here.

fields.label: Biographical Statements (for catalog)
fields.description:
Please start with the full name and refer to the SGL in the third person. Include background related to the subject of your course.

Please DO NOT include your email or telephone number here. They will no longer be included in the catalog.

Please limit to 25-40 words in one paragraph for each SGL.

fields.label: Schedule
fields.description: What days and times can you offer your course?

fields.label: Class Size Limit
fields.description: We have two sizes of classroom: those that seat 12 members, plus the SGL, and those that (variously hold between 18 and 25 people. The smaller classrooms have limited AV capabilities, and are not good for showing movies or for heavy use of slides. Larger classrooms all have podiums and good AV facilities and are required for classes with larger enrollments.

fields.label: Class Size
fields.description: Please choose the largest number of students you'd prefer for your class. Please note that decisions about this limit are subject to various factors. If your course is accepted and schedule, its cap will be codmmunicated with your notification.

fields.label: Small Room
fields.description: Please explain how your course content and planned approach would lend themselves to one of the small rooms. The smaller classrooms (G20, 118, and 307) hold 12 or 13 students and one Study Group Leader. Study groups with co-leaders should not select a limit of 12 because the space is too limited in these rooms. The smaller rooms are good for discussion and have projectors, but are poor for movies or extensive use of slides because of the seating arrangements.

fields.label: Colloquium Room

choices.text: I require or strongly prefer the Colloquium Room.
choices.value: I require or strongly prefer the Colloquium Room.

choices.text: I can use the Colloquium Room if that is the only way to accommodate my class size and schedule.
choices.value: I can use the Colloquium Room if that is the only way to accommodate my class size and schedule.

choices.text: I cannot use the Colloquium Room.
choices.value: I cannot use the Colloquium Room.

fields.description: The Colloquium Room can often be used as a classroom and has good AV facilities. Please indicate how well your seminar would work in the room.

fields.label: Thank you for preparing your course proposal.
Special Requests
fields.description: Please tell the Committee if you have strong preferences or constraints, not expressed above.

fields.label: Further Information for the Curriculum Committee
fields.description: What else should the Committee know about your proposal? You might want to clarify parts of your proposal or indicate how you are planning for the course, what mix of presentation and discussion you anticipate, what you wish participants to get from the course, or what assistance might be helpful to you. These comments will not appear in the catalog.

fields.label: You must press the Submit button to send your proposal.
fields.description: You will receive an email confirmation within a few days. DO NOT resubmit this proposal. Please contact the Curriculum Committee if you have changes or questions.

notifications.name: Save and Continue Email
notifications.subject: Link to continue {form_title}
notifications.message:
Thank you for saving {form_title}. Please use the unique link below to return to the form from any computer.

{save_link}

Remember that the link will expire after 30 days so please return via the provided link to complete your form submission.

confirmations.name: Default Confirmation
confirmations.message: We've received your course proposal and will be in touch soon.

confirmations.name: Save and Continue Confirmation
confirmations.message:
Please use the following link to return to your form from any computer.
{save_link}
This link will expire after 30 days.
Enter your email address to send the link by email.
{save_email_input}

confirmations.name: Save and Continue Email Sent Confirmation
confirmations.message: The link was sent to the following email address: {save_email}

meta.assignee_notification_subject: {sgl_1_name:8} has submitted a new course proposal.
meta.assignee_notification_message:
Administrator,

{sgl_1_name:8} has submitted a proposal for a course entitled "{title:1}." Please follow this link to assign a sponsor for the course.
[HILRCC_inbox_url formid="{form_id}" entryid="{entry_id}"]
meta.in_progress_notification_message: Entry {entry_id} has been updated and remains in progress.
meta.complete_notification_message: Entry {entry_id} has been updated completing the step.

meta.description: In this step, the Sponsor modifies fields of the proposal in preparation for committee review, or in response to input from committee members.
meta.assignee_notification_subject: You have been named sponsor of a new course proposal.
meta.assignee_notification_message:
Hello Curriculum Committee Member,

The administrator has named you as sponsor of proposal #{entry_id}, "{title:1}," submitted by {sgl_1_name:8}.

Please follow the link below to your inbox and review the proposal.

[HILRCC_inbox_url]
meta.in_progress_notification_message: Entry {entry_id} has been updated and remains in progress.
meta.complete_notification_message: Entry {entry_id} has been updated completing the step.

meta.description: This step follows modification by the sponsor.
meta.workflow_notification_subject: Proposal modified and ready for review
meta.workflow_notification_message:
Proposal #{entry_id}, "{title:1}," has been modified and is ready for review.

meta.description: The proposal is in the administrator's inbox until a final disposition is taken.
meta.instructionsValue: Instructions: please review the values in the fields below and click on the Approve or Reject button
meta.assignee_notification_message: A new entry is pending your approval. Please check your Workflow Inbox.

meta.description: Administrator sets final status of proposal.
meta.assignee_notification_message: A new entry requires your input.

meta.complete_notification_message: Entry {entry_id} has been updated completing the step.
